abstract: Taye Ismaila Taïwo (born 16 April 1985) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays as a defender for Turkish Süper Lig side Bursaspor. He is well known for his powerful and accurate long shots, and is a dead-ball expert. Taiwo's primary position is left back (number 3 position)
